reviewText: Anita's my favorite Christian comedian.  The DVD was shipped fast and it was a great experience all around.
Anita Refroe is a real person, and really funny! This video is hilarious and we have watched it over and over. I have even shown it at my ladies' Bible study group!
Shows that you can be hilarious without dirty words.  Her message is softly mentioned but has more impact than a 30 minute sermon.

Witty,
  Definitely for women only and for married and menopausal or premenopausal women.  Nobody else in my family enjoyed it because the men didn't find it funny and the only other woman is an unmarried 20 year old.
This is great fun, I enjoy the Bananas series because I know anyone can watch it. Its great clean christian comedy.
